Name: Ghost Guy
About the game: In this short adventure game, explore an abandoned mansion as a ghost. Collect items to help you along the way. Find secrets hidden around the house and find multiple endings -Collect up to 50 souls hidden throughout the mansion -Find health and speed boosts -Collect and wear 9 different hats -Explore strange rooms of the house -Multiple story endings to discover
